Organization.OrgFullName: Nanfang Hospital of Southern Medical University

IdentificationModule.BriefTitle: Omics Sequencing of Exosomes in Body Fluids of Patients With Acute Lung Injury
IdentificationModule.OfficialTitle: Exosomes in Urine, Blood, and Alveolar Lavage Fluid From Patients With Acute Respiratory Distress Syndrome (ADRS) Were Sequenced by Omics

LeadSponsor.LeadSponsorName: Nanfang Hospital of Southern Medical University

DescriptionModule.BriefSummary: The exosomes in the experimental group and the control group were sequenced to find the difference of the two groups, providing a basis for subsequent basic research.
DescriptionModule.DetailedDescription: This study is an observational study, mainly collected by infection, trauma, burns and other non cardiac causes without any related comprehensive character drug treatment of acute respiratory distress (ARDS) in patients with blood, urine or alveolar lavage fluid specimens, used to extract exosomes for omics sequencing, relevant histomorphic variations in exosomes of this disease were obtained, In addition, functional verification of genes or proteins with different changes will be carried out to provide clinical basis for subsequent basic research.

BioSpec.BioSpecDescription: Blood, urine or alveolar lavage fluid samples of the experimental group and the control group were reserved for omics sequencing

ArmGroup.ArmGroupDescription: Healthy people served as the control group
Patients with acute lung injury were treated as the experimental group.

ArmGroupInterventionName: Diagnostic Test: The lungs causes and extrapulmonary factors

Intervention.InterventionName: The lungs causes and extrapulmonary factors
Intervention.InterventionDescription: Acute lung injury due to internal and external pulmonary causes can be used as intervention items in this study, and intervention items can be excluded according to inclusion criteria and exclusion criteria.

PrimaryOutcome.PrimaryOutcomeMeasure: Compare the omics differences of blood samples between the experimental and control groups
PrimaryOutcome.PrimaryOutcomeDescription: Collected separately in the experimental group and the control group participants' blood as a specimen, It is used to obtain exosomes and perform omics sequencing, to obtain the histopathological differences of exosomes between experimental and control groups, In addition, functional verification of genes or proteins with different changes will be carried out to provide clinical basis for subsequent basic research .

PrimaryOutcome.PrimaryOutcomeMeasure: Compare the omics differences of urine samples between the experimental and control groups
PrimaryOutcome.PrimaryOutcomeDescription: Collected separately in the experimental group and the control group participants' urine as a specimen, It is used to obtain exosomes and perform omics sequencing, to obtain the histopathological differences of exosomes between experimental and control groups, In addition, functional verification of genes or proteins with different changes will be carried out to provide clinical basis for subsequent basic research .

SecondaryOutcome.SecondaryOutcomeMeasure: Compare the omics differences of alveolar lavage fluid samples between the experimental and control groups
SecondaryOutcome.SecondaryOutcomeDescription: Collected separately in the experimental group and the control group participants' alveolar lavage fluid as a specimen, It is used to obtain exosomes and perform omics sequencing, to obtain the histopathological differences of exosomes between experimental and control groups, In addition, functional verification of genes or proteins with different changes will be carried out to provide clinical basis for subsequent basic research .

EligibilityModule.StudyPopulation: The experimental group was patients with acute lung injury, which was caused by various direct and indirect injury factors of alveolar epithelial cells and capillary endothelial cells, resulting in diffuse pulmonary interstitial and alveolar edema, resulting in acute hypoxic respiratory insufficiency. The control group was healthy subjects.

OverallOfficial.OverallOfficialAffiliation: Nanfang Hospital of Southern Medical University

ConditionBrowseBranch.ConditionBrowseBranchName: Diseases and Abnormalities at or Before Birth
